08 APRIL 2019

Amruta Inc presents at 2018 Genworth Risk Symposium

ðŸ‘‹ Welcome fellow

Our Founder and CEO, Dr. Beju Rao, PhD, presented at Genworth Mortgage Insurance (GMI) Risk Symposium on November 6, 2018. He discussed the benefits of Big Data, Machine Learning (ML), and Artificial Intelligence (AI) in identifying, measuring and managing risk more comprehensively and effectively. In particular he talked about the identification of asymmetric risk by segmenting to a more granular data element level. He demonstrated Amruta Incâ€™s Explainable AI platform by providing risk narratives across various use cases such as fraudulent claims detection, hospital safety, financial crimes compliance, and mobile device failures. He talked about big data implementation, machine learning infrastructure, and explainable AI algorithms that constitute Amruta Incâ€™s platform. He also discussed the importance of Boardâ€™s familiarity with ML and AI as well as executive education and adoption of ML and AI data analysis methods.
